name: Avoid undocumented User-exits
description: ABAP user-exits should be documented. This reports shows all the ABAP user-exits with no comments.
output:
This report lists all ABAP user-exits that are not documented.

rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact.
remediation: Add comments into user-exit to explain what is their goal and how they work.
